author: jdcasey
msg: Improve the user-agent IT to directly test the User-Agent HTTP header passed to the server when attempting to resolve an artifact.

author: jdcasey
msg: Improve support for User-Agent header in http wagons. Also, add a note about problems with shallow-cloning of plugin instances to ModelUtils. Finally, comment out the component configuration for the lightweight http wagon in maven-core, so we don't need to wait for the next shade plugin release to do the next maven RC.

author: akarasulu
msg: removing poor setAllowAnonymous() method from abstract server - this should be explicitly handled in the configureDirectoryService() methods.

author: akarasulu
msg: using allow annon access only on direcltoryService instead of ldapServer

msg: using allow annon access only on direcltoryService instead of ldapServer
